ppe_requirements.respiratory: SCBA or supplied-air respirator for >5 ppm or unknown concentrations. Air-purifying with acid gas cartridge acceptable for ≤5 ppm with escape provisions.
ppe_requirements.skin: Nitrile gloves for liquid contact (cryogenic hazard). Thermal protection for liquefied SO2.
ppe_requirements.eye: Chemical safety goggles, face shield for liquid contact
ppe_requirements.minimum_level: Level C for known <5 ppm, Level B for >5 ppm or liquefied SO2
ppe_requirements.special_notes: Extremely irritating to eyes and respiratory tract. Cryogenic liquid causes frostbite. Asthma trigger - asthmatics extremely sensitive.

physical_properties.appearance: Colorless gas, colorless liquid under pressure

emergency_response.fire_hazard: Non-flammable. Cylinders may explode when heated. Toxic decomposition products in fire.
emergency_response.fire_suppression: If cylinder involved in fire, evacuate immediately - explosion hazard. Cool cylinders with water spray from maximum distance. Let fire burn out if possible.
emergency_response.spill_procedures: EVACUATE. Ventilate area. SCBA for >100 ppm. Neutralize with soda ash or lime. Contain with dry sand or earth. For liquid: cryogenic hazard - specialized equipment needed.
emergency_response.exposure_immediate_actions: Remove to fresh air immediately. Eyes: flush with water for 15 minutes. If inhaled: administer oxygen. Seek medical attention - risk of bronchospasm and delayed pulmonary edema. For asthmatics: MEDICAL EMERGENCY.
emergency_response.environmental_hazards: Major contributor to acid rain. Toxic to vegetation. Acidifies water bodies. Report releases >1 lb.
emergency_response.special_hazards: Severe respiratory and eye irritant. Triggers asthma attacks. Forms sulfurous acid with moisture. Corrosive to tissues. May cause bronchospasm and pulmonary edema. Cryogenic liquid causes frostbite.

storage_requirements.temperature_range: Store cylinders <52°C. Liquefied SO2 requires cryogenic storage.
storage_requirements.ventilation: Outdoor storage preferred. Indoor: mechanical ventilation with emergency backup. SO2 gas detection mandatory.
storage_requirements.container_material: Steel cylinders. Stainless steel for liquid.
storage_requirements.segregation: Separate from incompatibles. Corrosive gas storage area.
storage_requirements.quantity_limits: Per fire code. Many facilities limit indoor storage.
storage_requirements.special_requirements: Cylinder restraints mandatory. Leak detection system required. Post "CORROSIVE GAS" signs. Emergency procedures posted. For liquid: cryogenic handling equipment.

reactivity.reactivity_hazard: Reacts with water to form sulfurous acid (corrosive). Reacts violently with metal oxides and alkali metals.

environmental_impact.aquatic_toxicity: Toxic to aquatic life. LC50 (fish, 96h): 100-180 mg/L. Forms acidic solutions.
environmental_impact.biodegradability: Reacts in atmosphere. Oxidizes to sulfuric acid. Not biodegradable.
environmental_impact.soil_mobility: High mobility as gas. Deposits as sulfates. Contributes to soil acidification.
environmental_impact.atmospheric_fate: Oxidizes to sulfur trioxide then sulfuric acid. Major acid rain precursor. Atmospheric residence: hours to days.

detection_monitoring.odor_threshold: 0.3-1 ppm - provides adequate warning below toxic levels
